Text:
Another duplicate post, and again the PDF is 3x larger.  Why?

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7887293
Then you know what to do. Download the one you've linked to.
@kaiser: Of course :-)  But what is it about your PDF files?  Are you doing something to them before upping?  (Or maybe the other poster is, who knows?)
If i convert from an EPUB to a PDF it can sometimes double or triple the size of the PDF. I just haven't had the time to change the software i use when converting. I'll get it sorted ASAP.
